alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Knox; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 1:16PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Richland, central Ashland and northeastern Knox Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 115 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bellville and Fredericktown, or 13 miles south of Mansfield, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Ashland, Mount Vernon, Ontario, Lexington, Fredericktown, Gambier, Bellville, Hayesville, Savannah, Polk, Butler, Perrysville, Lucas, Bailey Lakes, Mifflin, North Liberty, Nankin, Shenandoah and Olivesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
